name: Perpetual Python
description:
Gameplay:

Oh no! Phil is growing uncontrollably again! Steer him towards the shrink orbs to keep him from biting himself!

Dark Orbs reduce his length by only 3/16

Light Orbs reduce his length by a staggering 3/8

Try to beat my high score (24340).

Control Options: Keyboard / Controller:

To turn left, use the "a" or left arrow key. If using controller, tilt the left analog stick to the left (untested).

To turn right, use the "d" or right arrow key. If using controller, tilt the left analog stick to the right (untested).

Touch Screen:

To turn left, click or tap the left side of the game window.

To turn right, click or tap the right side of the game window.

Onscreen Slider:

To turn left, drag the slider with your mouse or finger to the left. The father you drag, the sharper the turn will be.

To turn right, drag the slider with your mouse or finger to the right. The father you drag, the sharper the turn will be.
